Nido de Cóndores
Base Camp
Nido de Cóndores
LANKO EXPEDICIONES
It boasts camps in the most important
bases of the mountain, such as Plaza de Mulas(normal route) and Plaza Argentina(Polish Glacier´s route).
These base camps are equipped with meal services, radio link services, gear storage services, dining tents with dishes and electric light, bathrooms exclusively for our costumer´s use, guide-assistant or bearer services, gear rental and sending of e-mail via radio-Mendoza.
  Camps in bases:
• Plaza de Mulas (normal route)
• Plaza Argentina (Polish Glacier´s route)
